title: (x) HomeBank - Helvetica, Rotis Serif {Eduardo}
content:
I had such a wonderful response the last time I posted, I decided to try a job-related post this time!   
   
I need help IDing the font(s) used in [This logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221914/http:/www.fadingtoblack.com/gaylaprom/home.jpg). I've been doing advertisments for them for about 4 months and they don't even know the font used, and I've been using a scanned letter head and because I'm new to type ID, I know I'll just skrew it up if I try to ID it alone...   
   
Oh! And I have all but 10 fonts ID'd (from my last thread) Thanks for the Estee Lauder reference and link, I raided my moms makeup counter and found some of my fonts!   
   
Thanks in advance~Mikey
author: shyguy1
